cab.content: 6 g tii - - WAR CABtiniT.8.JM347. . *! BHIPPINS LOSSES. (Letter from Sir Norman Hill to Sir M. Hankey,dated 9th July fl?; - (Previous Papers Nos G.T.1150., a.T,lS?3 & S.T. 1308)Dear Sir Maurice Hankey, My list of Losses this.week is again an appallingone,, - There are Losses In the areas of ooneontration andthere are Losses an the routes. We cannot carry on if these Losses are to continue, Yours faithfully, . (Sgd). NORMAN. HILL.;'
